channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: J&K: #IndianArmy recovered 6 Chinese grenades from the Dachh
item.description: J&K: #IndianArmy recovered 6 Chinese grenades from the Dachhi forest of Sheendara sector in Poonch district. Operation still underway. (Video source: Indian Army)

item.title: Click https://shorturl.at/TMVq5 || The Bombay High Court hi
item.description: Click https://shorturl.at/TMVq5 || The Bombay High Court highlighted the need to educate boys about gender equality and change their attitudes towards gender issues.

item.title: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy If anything is sediti
item.description: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy If anything is seditious or anti-national or vulgar, there are laws to check that... Eventually, every state government will use vendetta through this mechanism: Suhel Seth, Columnist #IndiaUpfront #SocialMediaPolicy
